definition: to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
old variant of 以[yi3]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
old variant of 以[yi3]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: Be opinionated about themselves do not understand.
sentences.chinese: 自以为是的说着自己都不懂的道理。
他是一个自以为是的家伙。

sentences.english: In fact, it's also a kind of self-righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 其实这也是自以为是的一种表现。

sentences.english: Third is without any culture detail, bumptious child.
sentences.chinese: 第三是毫无文化底蕴，又自以为是的孩子。

sentences.english: Morrigan: "It seem that at least you got the self-righteousness down pat."
sentences.chinese: 看起来至少妳还有一套自以为是的完美认知。

sentences.english: They think themselves(to be)somebodies, but they are really nobodies.
sentences.chinese: 他们自以为是大人物，但他们真的是无名小卒。

sentences.english: You know, sometimes you’re too proud.
sentences.chinese: 知道吗，有时你太自以为是了。

sentences.english: You see, Aleks is this type of man who thinks that he is a Jogoo, a cock.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，亚历克斯是那种自以为是的人。

sentences.english: Look that know-it-all fellow is talking big again.
sentences.chinese: 瞧，那个自以为是的家伙又在吹牛了。

sentences.english: He thought he was a Zhu Geliang.
Henry soon realized he had outsmarted himself.
sentences.chinese: 亨利很快意识到自己太过自以为是。

sentences.english: In their self-righteousness, they have forgotten to rejoice when a sinner returns to God.
sentences.chinese: 在他们自以为是，他们忘记了欢喜一回上帝的罪人。

sentences.english: The tone of voice people used was belittling and self-righteous.
sentences.chinese: 人们说话语气鄙视而自以为是。

sentences.english: Are you setting up as a humourist now?
sentences.chinese: 你现在自以为是幽默家吗？

sentences.english: Suddenly aware of his often self-righteous.
sentences.chinese: 忽然察觉到自己经常自以为是。

definition: arrogant and conceited
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
arrogant
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
ridiculous self-importance (idiom); arrogance
to think of oneself as terrific (idiom); arrogant
to think highly of oneself
megalomania/egomania/delusions of grandeur
ignorant/ignorance
to be shortsighted
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
to think oneself clever (idiom)
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
silly/stupid
